author: andrea21z
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is created to remove unnecessary histograms for DQM HLT Muon validation. Summary:
  - Remove folders for different ID working points.
  - Keep only the most representative HLT folders.
  - Remove histograms that are not used in the validation. Keep only the monitor elements: efficiencyEta, efficiencyPhi, efficiencyTurnOn and efficiencyCharge.

#### PR validation:
- I check the output of the new branch running runTheMatrix and everything looks as expected.
- I execute the basic test suggested in the CMSSW PR instructions.
title: DQM HLT Muon cleaning
